General.Name: Wattanapat Hospital Trang Public Company Limited
General.Description: Wattanapat Hospital Trang Public Company Limited operates hospitals and clinics in Thailand. The company operates medical clinics, including obstetrics and gynecology, surgery, internal medicine, pediatric, neurology, cardiology, eye, ear, nose, throat, skin and beauty, dental, and health promotion center, as well as X-Ray and MRI center, emergency medical service center, accident and emergency center, kidney clinic and hemodialysis center, physical therapy clinic, gastrointestinal and liver clinic, orthopedic clinic, and diabetes thyroid and endocrinology. Wattanapat Hospital Trang Public Company Limited was founded in 1957 and is headquartered in Trang, Thailand.

1.Name: Mr. Chen  Laosunthorn
1.Title: Director and Deputy Director for Fin. Department
